name: Quartet
description:
iTunes store description (from Ad Blurbs)

Quartet is a fun, fast paced matching game.

The goal is really simple: you get given a face part each round, place it in one of 4 slots around the board and try to create a face.

Sounds simple enough, but not when you're up against the clock! You only have so much time to place a face part in a slot so fast reactions are needed, and you're faced with the choices of attempting to make a full face math, a partial face match or just frantically finding a free space for the face part. The more complete your face is, the more points you score.

You can also import your own photos into the game! How about trying to match faces of your friends and family?
alsoFor: Atari ST, Browser, iPhone, MSX, Roku | Combined View
